SELECT MS_VIQ_VERSION.VIQ_VERSION_ID, MS_VIQ_VERSION.VIQ_VERSION, MS_VIQ_VERSION.START_DATE, MS_VIQ_VERSION.END_DATE,
MS_VIQ_VERSION.DELETE_FLAG, MS_VIQ_VERSION.CREATE_DATE, MS_VIQ_VERSION.UPDATE_DATE, MS_VIQ_VERSION.CREATE_MS_USER_ID, MS_VIQ_VERSION.UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
FROM MS_VIQ_VERSION
WHERE MS_VIQ_VERSION.DELETE_FLAG = False

INSERT INTO MS_VIQ_VERSION( VIQ_VERSION, START_DATE, END_DATE, DELETE_FLAG, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID, CREATE_MS_USER_ID ) VALUES( :VIQ_VERSION, :START_DATE, :END_DATE, :DELETE_FLAG, :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID, :CREATE_MS_USER_ID )

UPDATE MS_VIQ_VERSION SET VIQ_VERSION = :VIQ_VERSION, START_DATE = :START_DATE, END_DATE = :END_DATE, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, UPDATE_MS_USER_ID = :UPDATE_MS_USER_ID
WHERE VIQ_VERSION_ID = :VIQ_VERSION_ID
